ly.img.android.ui.panels

Class TextOptionToolPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • ly.img.android.sdk.tools.AbstractToolPanel<TextOptionsEditorTool>
      • ly.img.android.ui.panels.TextOptionToolPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AbstractColorEditorTool.OnColorSelected<TextEditorTool.COLOR_TYPE>, TextFontSelectionEditorTool.OnFontSelected, DataSourceListAdapter.OnItemClickListener<TextOptionToolPanel.TextStickerOption>

    public class TextOptionToolPanel
extends AbstractToolPanel<TextOptionsEditorTool>
implements TextFontSelectionEditorTool.OnFontSelected, DataSourceListAdapter.OnItemClickListener<TextOptionToolPanel.TextStickerOption>, AbstractColorEditorTool.OnColorSelected<TextEditorTool.COLOR_TYPE>
    Tool view to add and control Text-Stickers.
